name: wil-aui-platform
description: Work-Based Learning platform for Al Akhawayn University

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma db push --force-reset && npm run db:seed
